name: Sign Ready
text: Our favorite pizza. The ORIGINATORS of the flavored crusts! Great job Howie & team!

name: Julian and Mary Meyers
text: Always love Hungry Howie's pizza. Especially the Union Hills and 35th Ave location in Phoenix. Great food always with great customer service.

name: Jessika Spear
text: I love Hungry Howies there play Woodcrest is the bomb

name: Jacquelyn Speagle
text: Wont fix the wrong order they sent me, manager says hes gonna fix it. Delivery guy comes back to the door with the kids pizza, tell me they wont be fixing our order and give me what i ordered for my kids and tell me they are just going to refund my money, i just want my food! Been ordering for years, never again.

name: Jennifer Hammond
text: I usually love hungry howies but I didnt like how burnt the deep dish was when it was delivered. I called the store, manager said she would trade mine for a new one,  and told me the deep dish are always burnt like that so suggested a ‚Ä¶More

name: Da Freak
text: Love the flavored crust. Wish the pizza toppings were little cheaper. 1 topping pizza is so Little Caesar's but too much unless others pitching-in.

name: Jordanlee Foss
text: I only come to this hungry howies because how amazing  the customer service and pizza are hunter one of there employees always has a smile on there face and is honest about what pizza is best. Thanks Hunter! Had to go out of my way for a review  for your awesome service!

name: Bart P.
text: I've always liked Hungry Howie's but attempted to order online from this location tonight and they wanted almost $39 for 2 medium pizzas. I won't waste my time again.

name: Steve Brown
text: Normally it's a great place tonight they just hapened to over cook it normaly I would give five stars

name: S S Johnson
text: The female Hispanic employee running the front of the counter (on May 3rd around 12:15 PM) was pretty rude. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sal Parrulli
text: Fast and friendly service.

name: The Pizza 411
text: The staff at this location is awesome. Place is kept clean and I always get my default favorite Meatball Sub which is more like a calzone than a Sub so  Iove it even better. First time I ordered online and they have it set up simple, ‚Ä¶More

name: Pet Peevs
text: Really good vegetarian pizza

name: Michael McDonald
text: Hmmm...I can't believe nobody has reviewed this Howie's location since I did over a year ago...oh, well. ‚Ä¶More

name: Connie D
text:
Pizza and sandwich were very cold unedible on delivery.
Order took one hour and forty minutes, store  is three miles away.
A vendor should not promise something to a customer for payment if they cannot ‚Ä¶More

name: Forest Of Trees
text: Better than Domino's and Pizza Hut. Highly recommend this as your pizza spot unless going for traditional pizza.

name: Much Sunshine
text: Our family loves takeout pizza. Surprisingly, this was our first time trying a Hungry Howie's. ‚Ä¶More

name: Big Dog
text: Good pizza and wings good price

name: Gaius Gaming
text: Always friendly. Pretty fast, but tons of deals if you order online. So very much worth it.

name: tammy bannister
text: Always consistent. Great crust and everybody in family agrees.

name: Basanth Chinivar
text: The crust was a little hard. Otherwise wonderful tasting pizza

name: Renee Mikael
text: Best pizza in town

name: John Fox
text: Sub was made different very loose . Different cook maybe.

name: Aravind P
text: Tasted garlic crust pizza - very pleasant and refreshing taste - got bored with usual pizza hut and papajohns- wanted to try something different- howies surprised us enormously. Will go back agin very soon üòÅ

name: Heath Merris
text: Ordered 50 dollars worth of pizza. Was told the driver couldnt take 100 dollar bill. So i changed it to carry out and drove up there. Tried to pay. Was told they couldnt take 100 dollar bill in store either. Was told to go to circle k and ‚Ä¶More

name: Brenda Holloway
text: It was great! Food good, restaurant clean. Manager very pleasant.

name: Father Son Drywall
text: Love there cheesey garlic bread also the pizza and wings are great just writing this review right now got me hungry, Im going to order right now. Thanks Howies

name: May Vonn
text: Its ok. Quick service. Fine for when on the go.

name: Lilli Linck
text: The team at this location is absolutely wonderful! My order came earlier than the estimated time. I was missing a 2 liter and a couple sauces and the manager Ryan was so great at helping me out! Will definitely be back to this location!

name: Nikki Fowler
text: My go to on pizza night! Can't go wrong with a classic pepperoni pizza with garlic crust! Try the Howie bread! It's worth the carbs!

name: Brittany Callahan
text: Love the pizza but they have made some mistakes in past orders.

name: Cherie Malone
text: Pizza was good for the price. Hot and yummy as we didn't live very far away.

name: Kayci Riggs
text: Always very friendly service. My pizzas always come out perfect and very fast. No complaints

name: Wubzm
text: They gave me 2 spoiled ranchers i paid a dollar each for. I'm never buying pizza, or anything from here again. Very rude and horrible service.

name: Chris armstead
text: Love this pizza.  On the day I went pizza wasn't that great.  Was under cooked

name: Marcus Reeves
text: These folks need some customer service training...

name: Kenneth HTC
text: Order was done super fast and the people working there are really nice I have ordered 2 times from this location and with separate staff so overall better than most pizza joints in AZ

name: Amber Wardall
text: Staff always treats us amazing! When we messed up by ordering both online and in store, they are the cost of the second pizza and gave it to us anyhow. So many thanks!!!

name: Amber Clark
text: Love their personal pizzas for $5

name: Angelica Fuller
text: Personally best pizza place ever! I recommend hungry howies strongly!

name: Joan Pederson
text: Picked up wings and a sandwich  I had the sandwich Ham and cheese  Delicious

name: Jimmy Rock
text: The food was great. I had a prior issue but they went out of the way to resolve it. Great customer service, very friendly

name: Donna Hermann
text: Best crust in town

name: Sherri Andrese
text:
I have to say, this is by far the worst Hungry Howies ever! Delivery is ridiculous. I waited almost two hours, after I was told 35-45 minutes.
I gave them the benefit of the doubt about the delivery and I placed a pickup ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Mulder
text: Good food to kill that craving. Quick service and friendly staff!

name: Nellie reddick
text: Noone here new any answers to any questions and I order 40 $$$ with of food some being large wings and they don't give no ranch for wings or diping sauce for them you have to buy them at .59 this is insane I never heard of paying for ranch ‚Ä¶More

name: loiset fernandez
text: IF I COULD GIVE THIS PLACE A NEGATIVE I WOULD!! I CALLED IN TO MAKE A ORDER AND THE "SHIFT MANAGER" WHO REFUSED TO GIVE ME HIS NAMES WAS SO RUDE THAT I TOLD HIM I WOULD BE ORDERING FROM SOMEWHERE ELSE!! IDK WHAT HIS PROBLEM FOR THE DAY WAS ‚Ä¶More

name: destiny Bala
text: Love their two for five Howie Roll deal

name: Marlene Taylor
text: Food was over cooked not very tasty at all very bland.

name: Peter Allen
text: I love Hungry Howie's pizza.  Always give you good value, but last time they were a little slow.

name: Arianna Dietl
text: Tastes terrible and the delivery is a joke. "40-minute delivery" was an hour and a half of waiting to get cold undercooked pizza.

name: Kyle Taylor
text: Just ordered an extra large pizza and wings. They showed up with just the wings and the delivery driver said "oh well, they're closed now"

name: Pam Pierson
text: Fresh and good tasting.

name: Jennifer
text: Awesome service

text: Awful tasting and high priced for what you get.  Over cooked and old product.

name: Jwr Panton
text: EXCELLENT AS ALWAYS!!!

name: Lindsay dudley

name: Angel Leo

text: disgusting pizza place ever unfriendly  took 10 mins to make a pizza pocket and still was nothing but uncooked doe in the middle just the nastiest this i ever had to top it off i asked for a bag because it was for to go and they said bags are only for salads annoying never returning  at least to that place.
